news: On the 10th of October 2024, infamous user 'ILoveVesna' had their dark past and true identity revealed. The man we once thought to be an innocent pinoy fillipino had turned out to be a Foodist BMT Advocate. However, some speculate a conspiracy is in full power and that Vesna is being framed for crimes he didn't commit. Has true justice been served on soyjak.blog? We may never know.
